) bannerList WHERE bannerList.rNum BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex}

INSERT INTO TB_BANNER ( BANNER_SEQ, BANNER_TITLE, BANNER_ALT, LINK_TYPE, LINK_URL, BANNER_ORDER, REMARK, USE_YN, DEL_YN, INPT_SEQ, INPT_DATE, BANNER_START_DATE, BANNER_END_DATE, BANNER_TYPE, BANNER_TITLE_COLOR, REMARK_COLOR, VIDEO_YN, VIDEO_URL ) VALUES ( #{banner_seq}, #{banner_title}, #{banner_alt}, #{link_type}, #{link_url}, #{banner_order}, #{remark}, #{use_yn}, 'N', #{inpt_seq}, SYSDATE, #{banner_start_date}, #{banner_end_date}, #{banner_type}, #{banner_title_color}, #{remark_color}, #{video_yn}, #{video_url} )

mapper.select: SELECT TB.BANNER_SEQ, TB.BANNER_TITLE, TB.BANNER_ALT, TB.LINK_TYPE, TB.LINK_URL, TB.BANNER_ORDER, TB.USE_YN, TB.INPT_SEQ, TF.FILE_PATH, TF.FILE_SYS_NM, TF.FILE_NM, TB.REMARK, TB.BANNER_TITLE_COLOR, TB.REMARK_COLOR, TB.VIDEO_YN, TB.VIDEO_URL, TB.BANNER_START_DATE, TB.BANNER_END_DATE FROM TB_BANNER TB JOIN TB_FILES TF ON TB.BANNER_SEQ = TF.TABLE_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND TB.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TF.TABLE_NM = 'TB_BANNER' AND TB.BANNER_TYPE = #{banner_type} AND ( DATE_FORMAT(TB.BANNER_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= DATE_FORMAT(TB.BANNER_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) ORDER BY TB.BANNER_ORDER ASC
